extendedInfo.description: Make it an All-Star Summer with Homerun Battle 2!The Homerun Battle Series is at its PEAK!20 Million Sluggers worldwide battling it out in 300 million online match-ups!Back and better than ever, the beloved real-time worldwide slugger battle has a sequel! Prepare to play the best android baseball smashin' game against sluggers worldwide. This game supports English, æ¥æ¬èª, ä¸­æ and íêµ­ì´ _________________________________________ CRITICS SAY:TouchArcade: "Homerun Battle 2 has all the elements that made the original such a hit and more. It's fun, it's easy to learn and it'd keep you occupied for a considerable amount of time." GameZebo: "Batting cage-like gameplay is a lot of fun. Slick graphics." 148Apps: "...Everything boils down to see ball, hit ball, watch fireworks go off. On this level the game is very satisfying and in many cases downright addictive." _________________________________________ FEATURES PLAY AGAINST OTHER PLAYERS around the WORLD CUSTOMIZABLE CHARACTERS Gender, body structure, skin tone- you choose âem all! Add extra stats and skills and accessorize with interesting styles, clothing, and bats. CHOOSE A STADIUM Choose your own stadium: Featuring eye-popping details and fantastic themes to perfect the setting for your grand-slams!6 DIFFERENT MODES DUEL : 1-on-1 Match-up Battle SURVIVAL : Survival Match-up Item Battle MISSION : Match-up with a maximum of 4 players to Clear Missions BURNING : Never-ending throws burn through the wind, Swing Blast High ARCADE : Challenge on Achievements and New Records TRAINING : Practice and train to be the all-time Slugger POWERED BY SOCIAL NETWORKS Get social! Enjoy community activities on Com2uS Hub, chat during gameplay and enjoy easy rival-add functions!ââââââââââââââââCom2uS: Your first search for fun!Check out these other exciting games by Com2uS!âââââââââââââââGolf Starâ¢: Experience the most vivid game of golf ever!Tiny Pop: A new super exciting bubble shooter!9 Innings: 2013 Pro Baseball: The Ultimate Baseball game!Tiny Farm: A Tiny Farm right in the palm of your hands!Heroes Warâ¢: Assemble the ultimate force of heroes to save the world!And many more!ââââââââââââââââPLAY WITH Com2uS!ââââââââââââââââFollow us!twitter.com/Com2uSLike us on Facebook!facebook.com/Com2uSFor tips and updates, check out www.com2us.com!

reviews.title: Awesome Game
reviews.comment: Its very interesting game awesome graphics nd beautiful playing environment i like it ... Thanx to com2us for providing such an awesome game
reviews.author: DrAmit Verma

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: This game is,100,000,000% fun and addicting wonderful job com2us in fact i already have five com2us baseball games but like i sed amazing!!!!
reviews.author: SheQuoia Manning

reviews.title: Great fun
reviews.comment: Great fun could make one change having no cost for playing games online or otherwise would make a great addition to the game other than that of fun great game with great animation
reviews.author: Derrick Glover

reviews.title: Superb
reviews.comment: Superb addictive game gives a great feeling while striking the ball great graphics must download it
reviews.author: Prashant Yadav

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: The graphics are pretty good except the people in fhe stands also the game is very fun and addicting so overall it is a good game
reviews.author: Bryce Howser

reviews.title: Home run battle 2 is the BEST!
reviews.comment: This is by far the most fun game I\'ve played in a while...very addicting...NO LIE! WELL DONE COM2US
reviews.author: Director21j

reviews.title: Awesome game. Eve  better app
reviews.comment: This app is great on my TV and amazing on my Galaxy Note. 5 stars.
reviews.author: Daniel Cohen

reviews.title: Principle dictates
reviews.comment: This is a cool game, but they bribe five star reviews with special bonuses. That downgrades them from a four star to a three star. That sort of thing is just douchey.  But download it anyway. It\'s good fun -- and if you\'re looking for a free game to play online against friends (cross-platform to boot!) you\'ve found it.
reviews.author: Matthew Thomas

reviews.title: Exceptional game play love the graphics  great job
reviews.comment: Looking forward to more of what u have to offer
reviews.author: Wendell Hood

reviews.title: Awesome game!
reviews.comment: I loved the previous version and played that a lot. But the graphics in this one are a lot better. There are different modes available in this one which makes the game more interesting. Keep it up guys!
reviews.author: Nirav D

reviews.comment: Great graphics and very fun and addictive. Good competition online play.\tNice feel when hitting and like controls. Lots of online play and not to many ads
reviews.author: jeff giamattei

reviews.title: Addictin but...
reviews.comment: Addicting and fun game to play with friends, but everytime I try to register the game crashes and closes. On average the game runs smoothly but would be nice to fix that and I would rate 5 stars. Once again, great game!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Download it u will not regret
reviews.comment: I have played this game from my 9th std and now i am.in 11th good game awesome graphics,mind blowing gameplay,and easier to us on old devices
reviews.author: rohan sarkar

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: Excellent game! Great graphics, enjoyable, and addictive. Keep up the good work.
reviews.author: Michael Freitag

reviews.title: Awesome I really like it
reviews.comment: Best baseball game i\'ve ever played and it\'s cool how you can customize your player  EPIC BRO!!!!!
reviews.author: Aarien Black

reviews.title: Amazing great game
reviews.comment: Great game play fun great graphics I recommend it .awsome great job guys
reviews.author: joseph arrisicato

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: Game is awesome. Very addicting and the graphics are great. The multi-player is really fun to play. I highly recommend A+  5 Stars!
reviews.author: Chad Pinelli

reviews.title: Addiction
reviews.comment: Such a addictive game. Once u start playin it you tend to play more n more n live online gamin makes it even more interesting... hi5.....
reviews.author: Himit Jain

reviews.title: Update was not great
reviews.comment: I have been having issues since the latest upgrade that has been done. Having trouble playing the game. Please fix it. Unable to hit the ball when I touch the screen. It takes a while and by that time I have already missed when the batter swings.
reviews.author: Virendra Golambade

reviews.title: Awesome game love the graphics
reviews.comment: I love the different items there is to dress your guy. Graphics are awesome
reviews.author: Matt Wallace
